annotation.text: Segment 1

Jewish name Isak Hauser – Eric Hauser – Yitzhak born in Gródek – very old town – grandfather president of Jewish community – old Jewish population and cemetery too.  Went to Catholic high school due to influence of grandfather – valedictorian.  Decided to study engineering.  Polish polytechnic school didn’t accept Jewish students – had to go to Czechoslovakia – engineering – masters in electricity and mechanical engineering.  Not accepted in Poland.  Had to undergo exam in Poland – didn’t get work near Lwów where Parents where.  Father building contractor – built small houses – approximately three hundred.  He had to give mortgages – well to do.  I couldn’t get job. Got job in West Galacia in Jewish firm.  I became assistant manager of oil fields.  Built a house there.  Forty to sixty oil fields.  I made a few inventions. I have patents (all obsolete now) war started in 1939.
Father built houses – sister studied to be attorney – brother accountant – sister owned big house in Lemberg.  We all worked very hard.  Though well –to-do, life not easy.  Countless pressure from Poles – resented Jews were wealthy and always trying to ruin father’s business.  Built church three miles from our building establishment and then said offensive to have business so close – fought with bribes.  I wanted to work as engineer.  Father wanted me in his field.  I was left wing and socialist - most Jewish youth were.  No hope in present Polish government and way treated us.  Arthur Kissler saying – “Red hot sun from the east will melt down the injustices from the west.” – believed in it.  Father disagreed so I had to leave it and find work.  Sister married an attorney and later emigrated to Russia – promptly shot by Stalin as Polish spy.  She bought movie house – father building huge house in Lwów – finished as first bombs fell in 1939.  Father always paid his debts – thought his work as “good as gold.” (crying). While the bombs were falling, he paid his debts.
Segment 2

I worked in West Galicia.  War came and owner told me to stay and watch out for his business.  He took all the money he could and escaped to America.  I was left with 220 hungry workers and no payroll.  A little money in bank – 250 zlotys and gave everyone ten zlotys.  Negligible money but showed good will – they didn’t tear me apart.  Workers mostly Poles – saved one man’s life – Ukrainian mechanic – Poles believed all Ukrainians were spies.  (Ukrainians sided with Germans and fought against Poland in 1918)
Ukrainian nice fellow – not a spy – war started and Polish army came and asked for Ukrainian.  Stood him against a wall – his wife came to me and I ran to sergeant and said vouch with my life for this man – said he was not political but a mechanic.  They let him go.  Later on he helped me during German time war lasted four days.  Polish army crumbled and moved east.  Our order to dismantle oil well and make them dysfunctional.  We did – we threw things into well and took apart machines – we ran away.  My name broadcast over radio by Germans to come back.  They wanted me to help put together wells again.  I knew once I showed up they would kill me so ignored.  Running all night because during day were everywhere.  I had an old car I had practically built myself.  Four others with me and drove by night on country roads.  Roads made of white stone and could be seen by moonlight.  Didn’t see wall and drove at full speed into river – broke steering wheel of my car.  Probably broke a few ribs – no time to even find car – impact threw me to other side of road – people in back seat flying over my head.  
	Left car on road and by foot went to next railroad station – last Polish train leaving station.  Was splattered with blood because had been straffed by German plane.  At last a train – went to Lemberg – on Russian side.
Segment 3

Nothing for me to do there – me my wife – went to East oil field, Boryslaw – father and mother in Lemberg.  Russians in – father was “owner” – employed three to ten  people – father wealthy.
Crime according to Russians – crime for children of owner too – tainted for life.  I was known – Lemberg so had to leave.  Went to Boryslaw – uncles and aunts there – 1939 – got job – had diploma as EE – got job in power plant – beautiful plant.  I was head of mechanic and electric department.  Peculiar experience to work for Russians.  Reason I do this interview is to show Russians broke our spirit.  Germans killed us physically, Russians killed us mentally.  Converted us from normal human beings with hope and ambitions, to ants scurrying and for food everyday.  Have special method – made us like Pavlovian dogs – stores operating only during working hours.  Wife and I both worked so couldn’t go to stores – had to continuously break the law – smuggled selves out, smuggled food – cut in lines, etc – like living in a prison.  American prisoner compared to this a holiday work all day and fight for food – great invention of Stalin.  Work most important though.  Food and other needs your problem.  Israelis went into desert with Moses and rebelled against him because remembered food in Egypt – found out do not have to feed slaves.  Just make the work and they’ll muddle through no time to think – always busy trying to get by.  Russian law permits six square miles per person.  Threw us out of our apartment – didn’t let us take furniture – just few eating utensils.  Russian police like apartment so you lose it.  Could struggle – broke us deeply and completely – made it easy for Hitler.  
Boryslaw oil mining town – Klondike life – miners with arms – rough life.  Fighting all the time – not afraid – but after “Russian cure” “they were all like lambs.”
Segment 4

Beaten down and went to death like a bunch of animals.  Russians tried to make informers out of everyone.  Called me in at twelve midnight and told to tell what neighbors say.  Said I didn’t know – said I would get better treatment – many fell for it.  I didn’t report so I had to sign paper of non-cooperation.  In power plant condensation pump had poorly damaged motor and we fixed it when it broke.  Called me at twelve midnight and told me why I didn’t tell someone put sand in motor – I said no, motor overheats every six to eight months and we fix it.  Insisted no – sand in it – gave me bad time but talked my out if meant Siberia – another time.  Stalin had assistant Malinhoff – thrown out when Stalin died – how if no work how eat – the literally – old people commit suicide or sell last possessions for bread.  Had to be on time to work – five minutes late arrested.
Fifteen minutes late – five years in Siberia.  One day one of my workers not there.  Risked own life to punch in his time card.  He came thirty minutes late had accident and came in expecting to work.  Later in pogrom he remembered this and helped me – May 1941 – large Polish population in Boryslaw.  Children went to local school – Polish holiday May 3rd.  Children dress in customs, sing and dance – forbidden under Russians.  How to tell children can’t have holiday – they celebrated and informer told and children arrested.
Segment 5

Commandeered trucks to take them away – about two hundred children age twelve to sixteen – some truck drivers Jewish.  Rumor one Jewish truck made jokes re: Poles finished.  Germans attacked in June 1941 – Russian army ran and left all heavy equipment – six to eight hours with no Russians or Germans.  Parents of children went to prison to get children – found shallow grave in prison yard with all children – shot in head – some hands tied with barbed wire.  Execution in Russia – tiny cell with door and opening at height of head – prisoners tied to door and shot through opening - executioner cannot be seen.  Parents remembered remark of Jew and rumor started Jews have killed our children.  Ukrainians hated Jews to begin with.  United with Polish parents and rounded up families of truck drivers and all Jews they knew and brutally killed them.  Forced to crawl – kiss dead bodies and beg forgiveness.  Beaten o death with lead and iron pipes.  Few survived because decent Ukrainians pulled out their own friends – one pulled out – the Rabbi.  One pulled out one of my friends named Bauer.  I lost thirty people of close family.  I escaped – I went to family and told them to disperse.  They refused because felt safer together – all died together.  I ran away and hid out – German occupied – as soon as Germans in, Jews had to register – I registered as engineering and technician man – gave Ausweis – (shows it) – later on all kinds of classification to decrease Jewish population – 16-18,000 Jews in Boryslaw – even had Jewish mayor at sometime.  Brought in Jews from small surrounding communities – estimated 20,000-25,000 – passed through ghetto of Boryslaw.  Drohohych next – sister town – ghetto estimated one week after Germans came in.
Segment 6

Kept decreasing ghetto by selection “Juden Aktion.”  Everyone was worthy of being killed – women and children in real danger.  Saw women with work ID’s tear them up and go to death with their children.  Others brought own children voluntarily to collection place and left them there.  Judenrat headed by Herz (WWI veteran) organized Jewish militia to bring in Jews for collection – under German police - mounted German police and Ukrainian militia – all worked to round up Jews.
When made us leave houses loot was there – I left books in my house and went back to get one.  I saw Polish man there stealing furnace door.  I didn’t know why there – I had Ausweis and told German police German robber and German police shot Pole in head – for an old door.

?Any contact with immediate family?
Wrote letters and sister answered – even bribed someone to bring them to Boryslaw – “label” – “R” with Ausweis – shows worked in armament industry – needed to bribe to get document.  Jewish council demoralized – in beginning started out as helpers.  “Helpers” decided old people should die and the young.
? You involved in Jewish Council?
Called me in because spoke perfect German – Germans called everyone “du-Jude” – called me “Herr Engineer” chief of police called me in and said I would be head of council – I asked for time to think.  Smuggled self out and hid for three weeks.  Meantime they nominated someone else and I got out of it.
Segment 7

Difficult because said if we don’t supply some victims, Germans will come and take everyone away.  Who can arrogate power of deciding who will live – what I say I saw with won eyes except few from other witnesses.  Friend Liax Hendler - our connection to German police.  Appointed by Judenrat to link Judenrat and German police – extremely decent man.  He thought I would remember things and he saw almost everything with own eyes and told them to me.  He would give valuables from Jews to Germans in morning.  In afternoon he worked next to me and told me everything.  Brought a group for execution to village near Boryslaw.  Tustanovtse – Jews sent forced labor to dig big grave and put plank over it.  People undressed completely and treated roughly especially women.  Brutal examinations and treatment.  Reached plank where (shutz polizei) militias – in private life a forester and hunter for Count of Lichtenberg and good shot.  Shot Jews with zeal and enthusiasm in back of head.  After 400-500 hand tired but shot and not killed.  People fell alive into grave.  Children thrown in alive.  Two Jewish men naked decided to run.  Six mounted police and trampled with horses – still alive thrown into grave.  Ukrainian militia in grave stacking bodies for space efficiency (killing 500-800-1000).  Covered grave with still many alive.  This was not a secret and Poles and Ukrainians walking by saw earth moving.
Segment 8

Another time “Juden Aktion” – still a small ghetto and looking to fill quota – Jewish drill master – named Hertman – jumped out window and hurt self – lying and moaning.  Germans short handed – Hitler youth helped because short staffed.  Officer gave youngster and said – “Leghemuhn” slang for “keep him over” – kill him – only twelve or thirteen years old.  Youth shuddered and afraid and another SS said to leave the kid alone.  First said “he should learn” – echoes in my ears – learn.  Another time a Jewish drillmaster – drilling for oil dangerous job – he had 6” heavy drill (weights 2-3oo pounds) fall on foot and crush it.  Took him to hospital and German police Nemitz heard crippled Jew in hospital.  Drove to hospital had him brought out and shot him in the head.  Wounded Jewish useless.  Atrocities went on day and night and transferred to local population and they saw legal and joined in.  Liked the idea of being better off than others.  Jews on bottom rung so anyone above it felt superior.  Creates specific psychosis and makes people cruel toward others.  Like killing a cockroach.  Saw with my own eyes – hiding on roof during Aktion even though had good papers.  Hole and I saw as they let out orphans.  Many died of starvation.  I was young and strong and could help myself.  Was stealing bread – others couldn’t and died – their child in orphanage run by Judenrat.  For a while I was in charge of workshop making shovels from scrap metal.  Stole some and traded for bread.
Segment 9

We got ration too because worked.  One ounce bread and bowl of soup.  From one ounce bread my workers gave portion to orphanage.  Order came to liquidate orphanage.  Children afraid and cried – wouldn’t go out – head nurse sacrificed self had papers and could have lived – she led them out.  One a little blond – I see him in front of my eyes (crying) and blue eyes – maybe four or five years old.  Mothers laugh children to run – he did – one German in front of column and couldn’t leave so let him go.  Polish woman caught him and dragged him back to Germans.  She laughed and said they will give you candy – brutalization constant all the time.  I saw militia bringing own mother to collecting point (former cinema) – collected before shipped by railroad too annihilation places or shot in Tustanvitza.  Jewish men brought in own mother – I know him – he worked in oil field.  In oil field engineer was a distinguished person always called me mister and respected me.  I looked at him bringing in own mother.  He said what can I do if I don’t bring her in today, they’ll take me in and get her tomorrow.  Quota to be filled.  Often Jewish militia could be bribed.  Barracks – male and female one exit.  Good looking Jewish woman there- militia drags her down and starts having sex with her in front of door in front of everyone in front of door.  He got up and said to me “Mr. Engineer, I’m protecting her” she has no papers so she owes me.  Probably both die tomorrow or day after so what’s the difference?
Six police – I remember names -  Mittas, Nico, Weiger – Captain Wipper especially vicious.  If had to deliver 1800 collected 2000 and bargain for bribes to let some go.  Also delivered over quota to make self look good.  Scene told to me by Max Handler – collected money at collecting point – hunchback – very wealthy – Wipper came in and hunchback had valuables to bribe him.
Segment 10

Wipper beat him and kicked his face with spurs – Germans all laughing – “Hunchback wants to be alive” – funny because “had no right to be alive – population decreased all the time – we built big tunnel under fence.  I delivered child born in camp to fence – we would have been killed – alive now in Israel – 1943 – Stalingrad eating German forces so fewer Germans.  Ukrainian militia half drunk or didn’t care – sheer luck – strings of lucky coincidences.  

Aktion before fully established – rounding up Jews – wife and I on way to work - I find out German Aktion – no place to hide wife.  Knew Jewish militia had worked in oil fields.  Took wife to his house and he refused to help – own wife hid with Poles.  Let me stay in his apartment – I heard them breaking in doors – had idea and put note on door saying owner of apartment in Jewish police.  Germans walked by without breaking in door – that’s why I’m alive.  German police killed many – many Russian POW’s working in area.  Woman soldiers and woman captain – ordered to carry ammunition and captain said we won’t carry ammunition to kill our brothers so they killed them all.  Wife in female part and I in male.  A built up oil fields – take over by Company [Baskeeden Elder?] – man who owned Jews named Butch – give medal by Yad Vasem – not sure he deserves – supposedly saved 2000.  When counted at end of war only two hundred of us alive.  I worked for Baskeeden and got own room because engineer – 10x10 – could live with wife.  Had to work in office and shave and wash everyday and no soap or water.  Lucky because natural gas in Boryslaw and pipes in bricks so always warm water – could wash and keep clean – if not clean, dead – typhus or killed by the Germans.
